content.question: In the last sentence of the passage (“They would have . . . grievances remedied”), the author uses the “either . . . or” construction in order to

choices.label: provide two possible explanations for why American women have not yet won the right to vote
offer two alternative methods of accomplishing the same goal
assert that patience is critical to smooth political transitions
imply that disruptive action may be the only way of resisting oppression in certain situations

content.answer: imply that disruptive action may be the only way of resisting oppression in certain situations

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how writers create, combine, and place independent and dependent clauses to show relationships between and among ideas.
